SEARCH
Package com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.utils

Class CardParser

java.lang.Object
com.butlert.tradingcardmanager.utils.CardParser
@Component public class CardParser extends Object
Parses individual lines from an imported card data file into CardDTO objects.

This utility class provides a centralized location for parsing and validating card data fields before transformation and persistence. By abstracting the logic, future adjustments to format or validation are localized here.

Expected file format per line:

 cardNumber - cardGame - cardName - rarity - datePurchased - dateSetPublished - purchasePrice - isFoiled
Since:
June 18, 2025

  • Method Details

    • parseLine

      public Optional<CardDTO> parseLine(String line)
      Parses a single line of text into a CardDTO object after validating all fields.

      Each field is trimmed, validated, and converted to its appropriate type. If any field fails validation, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown with an appropriate message.

      Parameters:
      line - a string representing a line from the import file
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the constructed CardDTO, or empty if invalid
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the line format is incorrect or any field fails validation
